name: Silicon
educationalNotes: Silicon is the basis of computer chips - every smartphone has billions of transistors made from silicon! Second most abundant element in Earth's crust (26% after oxygen). Pure silicon is a semiconductor - conducts electricity only under certain conditions (basis of all modern electronics). Sand is mostly silicon dioxide (SiO₂). Silicon Valley is named because of its boom in silicon-based tech. Forms more compounds than any element except carbon.
